item.title: CVE-2024-27899|2024-04-09T00:54:17.167Z -- SAP_SE -- SAP NetWeaver AS Java User Management Engine
item.description: Self-RegistrationÂ and Modify your own profile in User Admin Application of NetWeaver AS Java does not enforce proper security requirements for the content of the newly defined security answer. This can be leveraged by an attacker to cause profound impact on confidentiality and low impact on both integrity and availability.
